Literature.Title: Characterization of antimicrobial, cytotoxic, and antiendotoxin properties of short peptides with different hydrophobic amino acids at "a" and "d" positions of a heptad repeat sequence.
Literature.Author: Azmi S, Srivastava S, Mishra NN, Tripathi JK, Shukla PK, Ghosh JK

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 9144(MIC=6.25µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=11.30µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis NRRL B-4268(MIC=13.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=25.0µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 10536(MIC=6.0µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC BAA-427(MIC=25.0µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 27736(MIC=6.0µM),Candida albicans(MIC=3.1µM),Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=6.1µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=3.0µM),Sporothrix schenckii(MIC=3.0µM),Trichophyton mentagrophytes(MIC=3.0µM),Aspergillus fumigatus(MIC=3.0µM)
